attributes.action: Stop spending money on the 2012 Olympics while the economy is in such a poor state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It was announced today, Thursday 5th Febaury, that a further £100million will be spent on the London 2012 Olympics.
The country is in a state of recession, Post Offices, Schools, Hospitals, small businesses and even larger corperate companies are all being closed. Jobs have been lost, unemployment is rising. Surely with this state of affairs, money should not be wasted on an unnecessay and extravagant Olympic stadium. We, the undersigned, demand the money should be invested in businesses and used to help struggling families by way of benefits and tax credits.
Thank you
